WRITING.TEXT: I came out to him and my older brother at the same time they were 2/5 people who I personally told that I was transgender the other begin my mom,my one friend and my sister the rest found out through facebook/others. We were like we are now nothing has really changed. What do you mean that might all that he is doing to me? Its not him begin supportive at all. He is supportive tho I could go into but you probs don't really want to hear it. I am sorry that my responses that they reveal more I will update op soon and explain it better.

He know he can ask me questions or he can look on the internet but he has never done it that way.There has never been a miss communication between us I have told him to stop right when he does it. I can manage begin him immature but he shouldn't be making comments about my body like that way he does its would be different he was my so but he is not he is my brother he should no that its wrong and he has never pull any of this shit with my older sister ever to her face like he does to mine.
I don't know if he is joking or not he may have said that if he has I forgot but its still wrong. He has also slapped my ass before and I might have to bring this up to my parents.

I know its not him begin supportive its him begin as ass and sexualizing women like he always does. I am a pretty shy person and don't really like confronting this as that's why I really haven't done anything like that before but every time he makes a comment I tell him to stop.
I get it that way but he said at my 9 month apt that he wants to wait 6 months because I am 18 now. I also been expirenceing erections. And what do you mean all of those test?
im better then I was earlier I was pretty upset earlier I will want to but I am not going to I am going to go to bed right now and get my mind off of it.
That's what I want to really do right now I am so depressed about it. I emailed dr. Mcginn hopping I can get it in December as I will just lie about full time I just can't deal with it anymore.
I might be there the 11th.

See I don't have $900 dollars to spend on one I am a uni student plus I still need money for transation as buying clothes and makeup changing my legal documents. The only way I have been able to afford srs is because my insurance covers it.
No oc, just baought new monitors and was happening on my old montiors how would I see if its a driver issue I just updated my drivers
In pa you need to have srs for mtf I know because my mom told me before she knew I had to get mine changed in ny where I was born.
This is sooo freckin cute.

It's going to cost a lot of money but from what it seams my school district has a lot of money and they just built s new 15 million dollars school. The money that they are going to spend is dumb it could be spent else where as there hasn't been any trans person in the school but me for many many years. They could have just said thy trans people could use the bathroom they identify with and it would have been a lot cheeper.
Yes it is in Columbia county.
No this is Columbia county in Pennsylvania
Idk how they are going to do it we will have to wait and see
Yeah they do I think over the summer they are removing them and making one big bathroom but don't know for sure as of yet tho.

WRITING.TITLE: [Discussion] My highschool just went gender neutral
WRITING.TEXT: So I am a senior in high school but I take classes at the university instead but I am still in high school. so I only just heard it now but my high school went 100% gender neutral as of yesterday. They sent an email out to teachers saying that boys and girls can use what ever bathroom they want to. This was not something I was expecting at all as I am the only trans person to come out since at least 2009 while still in highschool. But after I came out it got a lot of people talking about it from what I been told witch probley help the decision a lot.
Never really asked my mom but my first name would begin with a "A" and middle with a "R"

WRITING.TITLE: Any hope of passing..
WRITING.TEXT: So I am just wondering is it possible to still pass if I don't currently pass at 8 months hrt I don't get gendered at all.
"Mom is my hair ok" " I am so fuckin gay" " No mom they didn't have pink unless I would have went with that."
It was always there for as long as I can remember thought It was a lost couse that I could never be a girl till I saw a vid about a year agao.
I got lucky it was a little bit over 3 months I was 17 at the time btw.
She knows I am trans she has just never said i look like a girl.

WRITING.TITLE: Male fail?
WRITING.TEXT: So I was downstairs talking to my mom and uni stuff and I pulled my hair back like it was up in a ponytail and my mom was like aww you look like such a girl.
Collage is one of the best places to do it I am doing the same I plan on socially transationing in collage. If you need support there should be a lgbt club at your school.
I am going to Edinboro university of PA I am a computer science major. Pick the school where you are more comfortable with as you will be there for 4 years.
Thanks
I have an eating disorder that is why
Yeah I know I am making an apt with my therapist so for my ed and hopefully that and the scare that my transation wont come out as good it will all work out.
My bmi is 16.8 as of this morning but I can't get it passes 17.4 at all.
Its hard tho its more then just gaining weight I tried to eat a lot today and I just cant I hate eating. Its not that I don't want to grow I do and develop during this puberty I really do.
Depends on where you are some laws you don't need surgery some you do.
Yes there are many people who just do hormones and don't get surgery. Having surgery doesn't make me more or less trans.

WRITING.TITLE: How much will begin underweight affect my transation
WRITING.TEXT: So I have been underweight for my whole transation by like 10lbs witch is not that bad. So recentally I have started to lose weight again. So what I am wonder will me begin underweight and loseing weight during my transation affect is a lot or will it affect nothing?
I have similar experiences on the phone they always start with he then stich to she and then sometimes they will switch back and forth guess they cant make up there mind.
Yes do it
The reason for the high price is he is for people with money to bur(celebrity Doctor) . There is probely no wait list and if your insurance will cover it I would say go for it if you want.

When I came out at my high school I just posted it on Facebook and from where it spread around pretty quickly where most of the kids in the school know.Most of the teachers and administrators know and I didn't even have to tell them.
It's a ymmv thing but for me it has been pretty easy considering I am only a 30b.
